title: Why do we still take bonus damage from Zoe's E after cleansing or waking up...
body: If you cleanse that long ass CC (that can prep for a oneshot) you can still take bonus damage from it. I believe with tenacity you can reduce the duration of sleep but after you wake up, you can still take bonus damage. I am pretty sure it's because Zoe's E is programmed so that it can amplify damage for a fixed duration and not based on how long the sleep lasts.

The whole point of the Sleep Mechanic is that when you are sleeping you take bonus damage and immediately wake up, that is the purpose for that cc. Pretty much sets up anyone for a one shot or a full combo.

cleanse only removes CC, it doesn't remove any of the damage effects from any spells. It used to sometimes remove the damage on some spells and not others so Riot just streamlined every spell still does its damage.
Why does it have to be true damage.
Because the Riot Dev that made Zoe and Yasuo is a total IDIOT.

Because its based on the initial amount of damage. Its not "double damage" if it has to go through resistance twice. In a sense it isnt really "true" damage since your initial attack has to go to the resistance still.
So MR doesn't massively reduce the damage

I mean that actually makes sense from a gameplay sense though.  Cleanse and the like are supposed to reduce the duration of crowd control, but a damage amp isn't crowd control.  It's like cleansing the slow from Fizz's ult, the fish remains attached and you're still going to be hit by that shark.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pEljhl2E,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-12-03T19:28:43.811+0000)

It's like cleansing the slow from Fizz's ult, the fish remains attached and you're still going to be hit by that shark.

Sleep is a CC that after a delay puts the enemy to sleep. While asleep, if you take any damage you will take bonus true damage up to the cap. Sleep is not an ability, it is a new type of CC Riot is implementing (like {{champion:69}} and {{champion:27}} Grounded, or {{champion:516}} Brittle). When you cleanse a Sleep, you remove the extra damage (or suppose to). It is nothing like Fizz ult where it both slows and amplifies damage.

I think the 'bonus damage on wake-up' is unique to Zoe and will stay that way, even if we get another champion with Sleep CC in the future. There is a precedent for Cleanse/QSS not removing the damage amp though in the form of {{champion:90}}'s ult. You can QSS the Suppression but the damage remains.
